name: Herbis
description:
Herbis - This is a match 3 game. Your task will be to connect several identical objects with a single line. Sometimes objects can become more explosive and by drawing a line through, them you can connect amazing combos, that give much more points. Each level requires a certain number of points to win and this requirement increases as you progress. The game is not very demanding, so you will have an endless number of tries.

Features:

  • 80+ levels with increasing difficulty.
  • Hand-drawn graphics.
  • In addition to the classic vertical and horizontal lines, you can use diagonal lines.
